message: i mean idios is no longer in pypi

I'm not sure if it was every on pypi, but I know the docs seem to suggest that it was. I hit this before. You need to add an extra-index-url to point to the Pinax dev area. Put this in your requirements file (taken from base.txt in Pinax):

## The following requirements were added by pip --freeze:
--extra-index-url=http://dist.pinaxproject.com/dev/
--extra-index-url=http://dist.pinaxproject.com/fresh-start/

Thanks I was telling someone they just  "have" to use idios. They complained that it was not on in pypi.  I was arguing with the dude that i used it on my last three projects and it was listed in my requirements file so it  just "had" to be in pypi. Then i checked pypi and he was correct, I just now checked the my requirements file and indeed i have -extra-index-url=http://dist.pinaxproject.com/fresh-start/
